document.full_text: the libyan government said on thursday it will send a representative to the next opec meeting, replacing the senior oil official who defected saying he had lost faith in the rule of muammar gaddafi.
document.title: libya says will replace energy chief who defected
lines_and_colors: the libyan government said on thursday it will send a representative to the next opec meeting, replacing the senior oil official who defected saying he had lost faith in the rule of muammar gaddafi.
